txt.en: You have never met this Temámir before. Why does he ask for you?
Itûr clears his throat, surprising you. He has a knack for moving unseen!
'TBD - Blah!'
'TBD - Blah!'
A small boat bobs in the water beside the platform
'TBD - Blah!'
Itûr offered you a place in the left storage room of the Refuge. He said to open the southern door and then the storage room would be on the left side of the hall.
You hear the sound of a door closing in the distance, and voices drift from above
'TBD - Blah!'
'TBD - Blah!'
Itûr has followed you into the left storage room. He has a worried expression on his face.
Return to the entrance of the refuge and learn the identity of the new arrivals
'TBD - Blah!'

Until he can learn what happened to his brother and his adventuring friend, it is up to Daxamat to make sense of things!\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>Daxamat's Refuge is just west of the Waterway Market in Umbar Baharbêl, behind an unassuming door.</rgb>
Itûr told you a Temámir dwarf has come to the refuge asking for you.
Talk to Phêlex in the entrance to the refuge
Talk to Khâsha in the entrance to the refuge
'TBD - Blah!'
A Temámir dwarf has come in search of you. But why?
Talk to Itûr in the entrance to the refuge
What would they do if they were here?
'TBD - Blah!'
Talk to Itûr in the entrance to the refuge
'TBD - Blah!'
Itûr has returned to the entrance of the refuge, and has some information for you and the Temámir Birûk.
'TBD - Blah!'
'TBD - Blah!'
Itûr told you about a useful feature of the refuge: a cellar beneath a trapdoor at the far end of the south hall.
You hear Itûr's footstep behind you as he enters the storage room
'TBD - Blah!'
Birûk nods pleasantly at the boat in the water.
Talk to Itûr in the left storage room
'TBD - Blah!'
Return to the entrance of the refuge to speak with the new Temámir arrival
Have more people come to the refuge? You should return to the entrance and learn who has arrived and for what purpose.
'TBD - Blah!'
Talk to Birûk, the newly-arrived Temámir dwarf
Talk to Itûr by the entrance to the refuge
Explore the cellar beyond the southern hallway of the refuge
Talk to Birûk in the cellar of the refuge
Two residents of the city have come to the refuge. But why?
Itûr stands in the entrance to the refuge, assessing the new arrivals.
What would they do in this situation, if they were here?
Itûr stands in the entrance to the refuge, awaiting your answer.
More new arrivals: a man and a woman you have not met before
Leave your belongings in a corner of the left storage room
They would fight. They would fight!
Chapter 18.3: Daxamat Takes The Lead
